Text: what is dmg file? what do I need to use it? Thanks for answering.
What is DMG?  How do I launch?
.dmg files are how mac computers install applications. its like an .iso except it can also be easily mounted and used as an install file without a disk

USE 7zip TO EXTRACT THE APPLE .DMG FILE

RENAME THE RESULT TO "WHATEVER NAME.ISO"

MOUNT OR BURN FOR ANY USUAL PC !
